text: "d4 7riy_TTTTf xifetaror 704 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sqn #Raat 3 {oTANf @Ae74) S4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3f-5 Qa 6, 7az7-10, ERGT, 7 fcri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/HAM Projects/2021 Policy Circular No.8.4.28/2021 dated July, 2021 (Decision taken File No: NHAI/GM(F)/HAM/-Interest/2020 Computer No: 46658) Sub: Interest Rate applicable for HAM Projects- Interest under Article 23.6.4 This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Mode Projects: The applicable rate of interest shall be as mentioned in Clause 23.6.4 Of Article 23, which states: "Interest rate shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%" _ The footnote specifies that "the Authority shall declare the list   of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks on Ist September every calendar year based on the Balance Sheet size as declared in their Annual reports. The year Marginal Cost of funds based Lending Rate (MCLR) of the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks shall be taken at the start of every Quarter.  2 _ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks along with their one year MCLR (rate of interest), applicable as on Ist July, 2021. 3_ The rates for 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks are as below: 1 Year MCLR Rate applicable for the Sr_ No. Bank' s Name in % period 01.07.2021 to (As on 01.07.2021) 30.09.2021 1 State Bank of India 7.00 7.23% p.a_ 2  HDFC Bank 7.20 (i.e. average of 5 Scheduled 3_ ICICI Bank 7.25 Commercial Banks) 4_ Bank of Baroda 7.35 Plus 1.25% 5_ IAxis Bank 7.35 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
